entity.name: Bartosz Sypytkowski
entity.description: Developer an maintainer of several OSS projects. Interested in building local-first applications, where data belongs to the user.

projects.name: yrs
projects.description: A Rust implementation of Yjs. It is a library that allows you to build local-first collaborative applications with ease. It's commonly used as a plugin for collaborative text editors in many platforms. It's a foundation piece for implementations of Yjs compatible libraries in other languages, such as Python, Ruby, C# and more.

channels.description: For funding maintenance work on yrs via Github Sponsors.
For funding yrs development via the OpenCollective.

plans.name: Supporter
plans.description: A token of appreciation. This plan is for individuals who want to support the project.

plans.name: Bronze Sponsor
plans.description: This is the recommended plan for early startups looking for a way to support the project and keep it alive.

plans.name: Silver Sponsor
plans.description: This is the recommended plan for companies, which use project in their products.

plans.name: Gold Sponsor
plans.description: This is the recommended plan for companies, for which the project is a core part of their business.
